_comment: NOTE: gosec -conf does not properly honor the 'exclude' field. Use command-line exclusions instead: gosec -exclude=G101,G115,G401,G402,G501 ./...

_exclusions.G101: Hardcoded credentials - false positives on error code constants
_exclusions.G115: Integer overflow conversion - SLURM resource counts unlikely to overflow
_exclusions.G401: MD5 used only for non-cryptographic cache key hashing
_exclusions.G402: InsecureSkipVerify is user-configurable and defaults to false
_exclusions.G501: MD5 import for cache keys, not cryptography
